body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Larry Johnson and the customer's name is Samantha Powell.  The conversation is about Mels Cars (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling ABC Services. My name is Emily. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Emily, I need some help with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course. May I start by getting your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Can you please provide your account number so I can look up your information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. And could you also provide the email address associated with this account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I have located your account. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I need to update my mailing address.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help with that. What is your new mailing address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one two three New Street, Apartment four B, New York, NY one zero zero zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I have updated your mailing address to one two three New Street, Apartment four B, New York, NY one zero zero zero one. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you, Emily.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for calling ABC Services. Have a great day! Goodbye.
